body: Lmao. Easy pussy. Soo... Is that hot guy a newcomer or a popular hot seiyuu? If he's a popular hot seiyuu, I think she just got a ticket for climbing through the ranks and then got no choice to follow the guy for the sake of her career. I can see her going famous while the MC got side-characters, and then she and the hot guy got a role of a couple and MC can only see them from the sidelines and felt like he won't be able to reach her anymore. Well you can add the usual NTR scene like the MC saw them going into the hotel and heard them having sex or got their sex vid as cherry on top.
